job_tasks.phrase: ontwikkelen van mobile apps en webapplicaties
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the creation and building of software applications, which is the core of software development.
Describes the process of adding new features to existing applications, a fundamental software development activity.
While broad, 'developing innovations' in this context, tied to building applications, implies software engineering for new solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: bouwen van GenAI implementatie in een applicatie
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions building a Generative AI implementation, which involves modeling and integrating AI components into an application.

job_tasks.phrase: realiseren van sample applicaties in verschillende frameworks
job_tasks.justification: Refers to the creation and implementation of example applications, a software development task.
Setting up a whitelabel application involves developing and configuring a software product for rebranding, a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: research doen naar opkomende front-end technologieën
job_tasks.justification: Researching new technologies can lead to the application of new modeling techniques or frameworks, fitting under the broad umbrella of Modeling in an AI context, especially when applied to development.

job_tasks.phrase: Je werkt zelfstandig aan nieuwe functionaliteiten en oplossingen voor complexe situaties.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the independent development of new features and problem-solving within the context of building applications.

job_tasks.phrase: obstakels opweg naar realisatie op te lossen of te mitigeren
job_tasks.justification: Indicates a focus on resolving issues and finding solutions to achieve project goals.

job_tasks.phrase: neemt initiatief in het organiseren van sessies met anderen om jouw applicatie te optimaliseren
job_tasks.justification: Demonstrates taking initiative and proactive engagement in improving one's work.

job_tasks.phrase: kijk je onder andere naar de huidige werkwijze, standaarden, best practices en nieuwe technologieën.
job_tasks.justification: This describes aspects of software development lifecycle and best practices, relevant to building and improving applications.

soft_skills.phrase: jezelf te verbreden en verdiepen in de technologie
obstakels opweg naar realisatie op te lossen of te mitigeren

classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building GenAI implementations within applications, which aligns with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer. While there's a strong focus on front-end development, the explicit mention of integrating GenAI points towards this specialized profile over a general Software Development role.
